hero.title: Remember Your Ancestry
hero.subTitle: "Uncovering your ancestors has never been more exciting, bringing stories from the past to life. At The Stamboom, you create your own beautifully designed family tree. Perfect as a unique gift or a meaningful piece for your own wall!"

aboutus.title: What is The Stamboom?
aboutus.subTitle: The Stamboom team provides beautifully designed tools to create and showcase family trees, helping you turn genealogical data into a stunning visual piece for your family.

paragraphs.title: Why The Stamboom?
paragraphs.content:
We created The Stamboom to fill a gap: attractive and easy-to-use templates for pedigree charts, fan charts, and more were hard to find.

Our tools make it simple for everyone to design and display their family history in a clear, engaging way - so you can share your family’s story beautifully.

features.title: Your Fanchart & Pedigree
features.subTitle: The Stamboom tools visualize your ancestry with great ease!

features.title: Fanchart
features.description: The Fanchart tool is the ultimate and easiest way to picturize your ancestors. Print as a poster, on canvas or any other material and make it a great gift to family members or friends.

features.title: Fanchart & Pedigree
features.description: The Pedigree will handle hundreds of familymembers and still make a clear overview. Print in very large size or use  online to navigate through your ancestry. Includes the Fanchart.

features.title: Fanchart & Pedigree Unlimited
features.description: This package if for genealogy-lovers and allows you to make unlimited outputs for a year (fair use please, thanks!). Use as a great overview of your whole familytree.

pricing.title: Pricing
pricing.subTitle: We made a Basic, Standard and Pro plan to suit your preferences.  All plans offer a variety of features to create a great familytree.

cta.title: Distinguish between Fanchart and Pedigree
cta.subTitle:
A Fanchart is a semi-circular diagram that radiates outward from a central person, expanding in a fan shape as it traces multiple generations of ancestors. It offers a broader, more comprehensive view, displaying numerous family lines at once.

A Pedigree is a traditional, branching family tree that represents the relationships between multiple family members over generations, often including siblings. It typically displays how various individuals within a family are related, with each branch representing a different line of descent.

questions.question: How Do I Change My Billing Information?
questions.response: Click on your profile picture in the top right corner of the page and select Account Settings

questions.question: How Does Payment System Work?
questions.response: A payment system is a way to transfer money from one person or organization to another.

questions.question: How do I create a person in the pedigree ( also called 'node')?
questions.response: Create 'persons' by entering their First Name(s), Familyname, DateOfBirth, DateOfDeath and a Photo. Missing some data? No problem; leave it open and/or add it later on.

questions.question: What does 'Stamboom' mean?
questions.response: Stamboom is Dutch for Pedigree, comparable with  Familytree.

contact.title: Let's Get In Touch!
contact.subTitle: Ask us anything about this site and its products. We love hearing from you!
